attributes.action: Introduce laws to prevent relgious laws having any legal status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should introduce  legislation to prevent religious laws such as Sharia Law having any legal status. Ensure that all UK citizens have to live by the same laws and no-one has any special status above the law or has a different set of laws applied to them.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
